content: My husband is a public school teacher in MA and I was surprised to learn his pension contributions are taxed. I have to get used to thinking about it very differently than my 403b contributions. It always feels unfair when we file taxes because our taxable income is soooo much higher than what we take home. I have to admit that I haven’t put the effort into figuring out how much to try to put in pre-tax accounts like you have though…Something I should look into for next year!
